Lucas LI

Competition Manager of Solar Decathlon China

Lucas LI is a motivated architectural engineer, art lover, freelance programmer, and lifelong learner.

Lucas received his Bachelor of Building Environment & Facilities Engineering from Tongji University in 2012, and got his Master of Architectural Engineering from Purdue University in 2015.
